comments:
The following is the NPE I get when opening a closed efs project where the connections password is not saved.  Depending on the type of connection you use the result in the end will be different.  FTP will error after saying can't get remote file.  DStore Linux will keep displaying an error dialog saying invalid username and password.  Close the dialog and another one pops right back up.

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Create a new connection.
2. Connect to the new connection, but do not save username/password.
3. Find some folder and select Create Remote Project.
4. Go to Java Perspective.
5. Expand the project.
6. Close and reopen eclipse.
7. The project is now closed.  Right click on it and select Open Project.
--> NPE.

java.lang.NullPointerException
